data.text: You return to the square with the frozen golem. It creaks as it struggles to face you.
You spend an hour and a half working on the golem in the square. Occasionally you have to hide from gremlins or various other monsters, but for the most part it's pretty peaceful.

At the end of it, the golem is still creaky and weathered-looking, but it can move around just fine. It bows gracefully to you, then assumes a defensive posture in front of you with its spear out. It seems it will protect you.
